title: Analysis: Confusion, but not panic, reigns in global finance in Russia's wake - Reuters
content:
1. Analysis: Confusion, but not panic, reigns in global finance in Russia's wake  Reuters
  2. Ripple effect: What Russias invasion of Ukraine means for global finance  Business Standard
  3. How companies can put an end to Putin  Yahoo Finance
  4. Putin’s errors over Ukraine could herald big change for global finance  The Guardian
  5. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Western allies’ sanctions against Russia have started to blow back in the form of large potential losses for their own banks, companies and investors, often in unexpected ways. In the past, such fires have been precursors to financial crises.
